channel.title: Client connections
channel.description: I have had my server online now for 5 hours. 7 people downloaded my client and now im sure they cant connect. my client is goofy and i need some help guys! please. My ports are open too.

item.title: Client connections
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

Check canyouseeme.org and itâ€™ll tell you if your ports are open.
Make sure your no-ip is running.
And go client side and look for client.java then search 127.0.0.1 and change them to your no ip.

Read full topic
